BackgroundInformation.value: AHS Drug Formulary Restrictions:Acute Care: Restricted to the treatment of: 1) suspected or confirmed bleeding of esophageal varices, 2) prevention of post-operative complications following pancreatic surgery, 3) acromegaly, 4) control of symptoms in patient s with vasoactive intestinal peptide secreting tumors (VIPoma) or metastatic carcinoid syndrome.
